mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Alice A. Carr
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Alice A. Carr John C. Hall, Guardian B. P. Elliott , Clerk of Floyd County, assigned Guardian ad litem for Alice A. Carr in the matter of John C. Hall vs. Alice A. Carr Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 143, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
